paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Ocular pain, scalloped pupils, ocular hypertension, and amyloid deposits.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 42 years old man, with FAP (Val30Met mutation), liver transplantation in 1997.
His brother and mother had type 1 FAP.
His brother and mother had type 1 FAP.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation in TTR is known to cause familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The Val30Met mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance data is based on the family history provided in the case report.
key_quotes: A 42 years old man, with FAP (Val30Met mutation), liver transplantation in 1997.
His brother and mother had type 1 FAP.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the case report.
